karyotype: Cikakken saitin chromosomes a cikin kwayoyin halitta
m: Chromosomes waɗanda suke kama da kamanni kuma suna ɗauke da kwayoyin halitta don halaye iri ɗaya
meiosis: Tsarin rarraba kwayoyin halitta wanda ke samar da gametes (sperm da kwai) tare da rabin adadin chromosomes a matsayin mahaifar tantanin halitta.
mitosis: Tsarin rabon tantanin halitta wanda ke samar da sabbin ƙwayoyin halitta tare da adadin chromosomes iri ɗaya kamar tantanin halitta na iyaye
karyotyping: Yin nazarin chromosomes na mutum don gano rashin daidaituwa
genotype: Halitta kayan shafa na kwayoyin halitta
phenotype: Abubuwan da ake iya gani na kwayoyin halitta, waɗanda aka ƙaddara ta hanyar genotype da muhalli
rinjaye: Allele wanda ke rufe tasirin abin rufe fuska yayin da yake kan chromosome iri ɗaya
recessive: Allele wanda aka rufe ta da babban allele lokacin da yake kan chromosome iri ɗaya
square punnett: Zane da aka yi amfani da shi don hasashen yuwuwar zuriya ta gaji takamaiman halaye
fasahar kere-kere: Amfani da rayayyun halittu ko samfuran su don gyara ko ƙirƙirar sabbin samfura ko matakai
gmo: Gagarawar da aka yi wa kwayoyin halitta da aka canza fasalin halittarsu ta hanyar da ba ta faruwa ta dabi'a.
maganin rigakafi: Abubuwan da ke kashe ko hana haɓakar ƙwayoyin cuta
\u0199wayar cuta: Wakilin kamuwa da cuta wanda ke yin kwafi kawai a cikin sel na kwayoyin halitta
rigakafi: Shirye-shiryen ilimin halitta wanda ke ba da rigakafi ga takamaiman cuta
tsarin juyayi: Cibiyar sadarwa na sel na musamman waɗanda ke watsa bayanai a cikin jiki
endocrine tsarin: Tsarin gland da ke samar da hormones waɗanda ke daidaita ayyukan jiki daban-daban
tsarin jini: Tsarin gabobin jiki da tasoshin da ke jigilar jini a cikin jiki
tsarin rigakafi: Tsarin kwayoyin halitta da gabobin da ke kare jiki daga cututtuka
pathogen: Microorganism ko kwayar cutar da ke haifar da cututtuka
daidaitawar juyin halitta: Halin da ke ba da fa'idar rayuwa ko haihuwa ga kwayoyin halitta a cikin muhallinta
bayani: Tsarin da sabbin nau'ikan ke fitowa daga nau'in da ke akwai
